content.raw:
This PR has been confirmed to fix the issue.   
Quick comment for future reference: To use the gravity compensation plugin, either have a DART deb install, or build from source. This fix is for the latter case to find the header files.  
Make sure that Gazebo branch will find a compatible DART release/branch if building from source.
content.html:
This PR has been confirmed to fix the issue.
Quick comment for future reference: To use the gravity compensation plugin, either have a DART deb install, or build from source. This fix is for the latter case to find the header files.
Make sure that Gazebo branch will find a compatible DART release/branch if building from source.
